overview: Studio 2000 decided to take a trip to Argentina to see what type of trouble we could find. Our friend, director Luciano Haas, down in Buenos Aires said there were tons of hot guys so we loaded up our cameras and headed south...way south. And he wasn't kidding. We found dozens of guys we wanted to film. Of course, some took a little more coaxing than others. We managed to come up with 12 great looking guys to perform especially for you. Gorgeous faces, great bodies and delicious uncut cocks were everywhere. In fact, we had such a great time in Buenos Aires, we have decided to start a brand new series called Perfect Pairs.
title: Perfect Pairs 1
